source_sentence: 汝常持此金剛杵　　即金剛手堅固戒　金剛薩埵勝修中　　一切由斯得成佛復次大明曰。
translation: 'Always carry this vajra, which is the vajra-hand firm precepts, the vajrasattva's superior cultivation, and from this you'll attain Buddhahood.' Furthermore, he said in the great verse.

source_sentence: 唵(引)薩哩嚩(二合)怛他(引)誐多悉提(一句)嚩日囉(二合)三摩曳(引)底瑟姹(二合)(二)伊沙埵(引)馱(引)囉夜(引)彌嚩日囉(二合)薩埵(三)呬呬呬呬吽(引)(四)然後從普賢心安布大印三昧。
translation: "Om(citation) sarīva(b) tantra(citation) gaṭa siddhi(1) vajra(b) samaye(citation) tiṣerye(2) isattva(citation) dharma(citation) rāya(citation) mṛgāra(b) sattva(3) hṛgāra(citation)(4) then spread the great seal samādhi from the mind of Samantabhadra.
He then explains the great luminosity of such a mind, saying.

source_sentence: 摩賀(引)三摩邪薩埵三摩邪薩怛鑁(三合一句)摩賀(引)三摩邪薩都(引)[亢*欠](二)摩賀(引)三摩邪薩埵(引)提底瑟姹(二合)莎[牟*含](引)(三)如是印明。
translation: "Māho(citation needed) samāyasattva, samāyasattva, samāyasattva, samāyasattva, samāyasattva, samāyasattva, samāyasattva, samāyasattva, samāyasattva, titiṃśeṣika, samāyasattva, and mu*ham (citation needed).
The bodhisattvas holding the vajra are all numerous.

source_sentence: 皆悉於彼諸印真實大三昧中同一成就。
translation: They all accomplish the same great samādhi of the true reality of those signs.

source_sentence: 復次身語心金剛所成心大明曰。
translation: Furthermore, the great clarification of the mind accomplished by the vajra of body, speech, and mind says.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)薩埵三摩邪末努播(引)羅邪(一句)嚩日囉(二合)薩埵堆(引)奴(引)鉢底瑟姹(二合)(二)捺哩(二合)除(引)彌(引)婆嚩(三)蘇覩(引)沙踰(二合引)彌(引)婆嚩(四)阿努囉訖覩(二合引)彌(引)婆嚩(五)蘇布(引)沙踰(二合引)彌(引)婆嚩(六)薩哩嚩(二合)悉提孕(二合)彌(引)鉢囉(二合)野蹉(七)薩哩嚩(二合)葛哩摩(二合引)蘇左彌(引)唧多室利(二合引)煬酤嚕吽(八)訶訶訶訶呼(引)(九)婆誐鑁薩哩嚩(二合)怛他(引)誐多(十)嚩日囉(二合)摩(引)彌(引)捫左嚩日哩(二合引)婆嚩(十一)摩賀(引)三摩邪薩埵阿(引)(十二)如是身語心金剛所成心明章句。
translation: "Om(citation) Vajrasattva samādhi(b), Manubha(citation), Rāṣṭrapāla(citation), (1) Vajrasattva dum(citation), Nu(citation), Bhadrika(b), (2) Nārī(b), (3) Sutro(citation), Sayū(b), (4) Anurāh Ketu(b), (5) Subu(citation), Sayū(b), (6) Siddhârthas(b), (7) Sutro(b), (8) Hahahaha(citation), (9) Gaṅgata(b), (10) Vajrasattva(b), (11) Māho(citation), Samādhi(citation), (12) This is the chapter and verse of the mind-explanation of the adamantine accomplishment of body speech and mind.
If he recites it once.

source_sentence: 即得自身語心金剛三業一切密印堅固成就。
translation: He'll then attain the resolute accomplishment of all the mysterious seals of his speech, mind, and vajra samādhi.
All the original saints and other things that they do have use for.

source_sentence: 於三部中或復二部當得成就。
translation: In one or both of the three divisions, they'll attain accomplishment.
In the present life, he'll immediately become a buddha.
Perhaps he'll become a vajra-handed honored one.
Foshuo mimi xiang jing zhong
